column4: I did ran purge pulseuaido to get my spotify working, but now my sound on youtube etc doesn't work, how do I fix that?
or you could not have uninstalled anything and tell wine to use pulseaudio
I did only have "OSS" in the menu, but do you know how to get back the sound on youtube etc?=
try with flashplugin-nonfree.extrasound for OSS support
